name: fisher
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who catches fish, especially as a job: Barbara is a fisher who works out of Morro Bay with her husband, Tom. Commercial fishers supply a ready and willing market. Compare
angler
fisherman
More examplesFewer examplesThirty million low-income people earn their livelihoods as fishers.Freshwater fishers have had to buy an annual licence since 1992.Hurricanes grounded many commercial boats, leaving some fishers out of work for at least two weeks.Sport fishers have set seasons and fish limits per trip.
